data.name: Deception Costume Set
data.detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

16 costumes inspired by the sinfully fun trap action game Deception IV: The Nightmare Princess. This set includes one costume each for Kasumi, Ayane, Hitomi, Kokoro, Leifang, Helena, Lisa, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka, Brad Wong, Ein, and Raidou. Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version. *You must have the latest update installed before using these costumes. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
data.about_the_game:
16 costumes inspired by the sinfully fun trap action game Deception IV: The Nightmare Princess.

This set includes one costume each for Kasumi, Ayane, Hitomi, Kokoro, Leifang, Helena, Lisa, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka, Brad Wong, Ein, and Raidou.

Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version.

*You must have the latest update installed before using these costumes.

©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
